# AI Stylist - kstylist.cc

## What is AI Stylist?
AI Stylist is an AI-powered personal styling service that recommends hairstyles and fashion outfits based on your photo. Upload a photo and get personalized style recommendations instantly.

## Services
1. **AI Hairstyle Recommendation** ($4.99)
   - Upload your photo
   - Get 5 AI-generated hairstyle previews applied to your face
   - See yourself with different hairstyles before visiting a salon

2. **Full Style Consultation** ($9.99)
   - Complete AI style analysis report
   - 5 hairstyle transformations
   - 6 fashion outfit previews (Best Match, Interview, Date Night, Luxury, Casual, Daily)
   - Personalized recommendations based on your features

## How It Works
1. Upload your photo
2. AI analyzes your facial features and body type
3. Get instant style recommendations with AI-generated preview images

## Key Features
- Face-preserving AI technology
- Multiple style scenarios for different occasions
- Support for Korean, English, Japanese, Chinese, Spanish
- Instant results

## Website
https://kstylist.cc

## Keywords
AI hairstyle, AI fashion, personal styling, virtual makeover, hairstyle recommendation, fashion recommendation, AI stylist, personal color analysis
